children.desc:
The VSC8562 has been brought out of reset and is ready for
software control
Enable for the VSC8562 power up state machine
Software control for the COMA_MODE pin.
1 if a transaction is in progress
1 for active interrupt (inversion of miim_phy_to_fpga_mdint_l pin)
Address for which PHY to configure
Write a 1 here to begin a transaction
Number of bytes to read/write in the I2C transaction. up to 128 bytes.
2'b00 to read, 2'b01 to write, 2'b10 to random-read.
